Case No.: {!Case.CaseNumber}
Dear Customer,
Thank you for contacting our business solutions team. Your case number is {!Case.CaseNumber}. Our business solutions team are investigating your query and will respond to you shortly.
If you would like to send a further email regarding this case, please reply to this email. Responding directly to this email will ensure your follow up is automatically linked to your case for ease of tracking. If you send a further email that is not a reply to this email, our system will create a new case.
As always, if your enquiry is of an urgent nature, please call us on your dedicated number.
We look forward to speaking with you soon.
Thank you,
StarTrack Business Centre {!Case.Thread_Id}
